website_summaries.verdict: This thickened product offers trendy buyers a stylish down jacket with surprisingly effective features.
pros: Available to purchase in a variety of colors
Jacket is windproof for excellent warmth
cons: Smaller fit than most customers expected

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this jacket today but was instantly disappointed. The stitching on the jacket is terrible and is coming apart in multiple places all over the jacket. It is sewn very poorly. Also when I received the coat, the zipper on the side of the jacket is completely stuck and will not move up or down in either direction. Can't believe i received it this way. It's getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Blondiee

customer_reviews.title: NEW FAVORITE!
customer_reviews.text: SO WARM. So stylish! I am so in love with this coat. It seems very well put together and heavy and sturdy. I am usually a size L/XL in everything and the large fits perfectly with the zippers up on the sides. It gets a bit narrow around the hips but it's adjustable so it's fine! Absolutely love this coat ❤️ For reference I am 5'4 & 200lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Much Improved!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and hope Orolay goes back to what they started and not skimp. And Orolay has made improvements and I'm back to loving first Parka-love!!! As every product-making company has done at some point where 1 or 2 pieces may slip through the inspection, I just happened to have received that particular one. Todate, I'm the same pleased Orolay owner I was when I purchased my first in 2014. I hope you enjoy the same. Thanks4listening. MP
customer_reviews.author: Monica Pindle

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: Customer Service on POINT
customer_reviews.text: My previous experience has been completely replaced with positive feelings and great customer service. The company has replaced the jacket I received with a beautiful, new, fresh and well-made jacket. The quality is excellent, smelled clean when opened, very warm! I love the cozy layers in this jacket too. It fits true to size and I adore it! Mistakes happen, but it’s how you respond to them that matters most and I am happy to report the response and quality of jacket is worth every single star.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Used, ripped, greasy, gross and other people’s hair. It was disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: Gross and completely ripped. We received this jacket today. Imagine our surprise to find a rip, several inches long, up the side of the jacket. Couple that with the hair and yellow stains we found inside the hood. It has obviously been worn several times and returned. It was disgusting. Greasy yellow stains and hair in the hood. Huge rip in the side. How could this even happen? Just find used/dirty jackets and sell them? We already printed the return label. We don’t even want this in our house it was so gross. Post office first thing tomorrow. Never again. Just gross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality, warmth, and style elements are outstanding!  Sizing runs large on a Small.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter. The quality, warmth, and style elements are outstanding! I ordered a Small. It's not a true U.S. small. The coat runs a little large. This could be a plus with comfort and layers in the winter. I may be biased as a Dad, but I think my daughter looks great in the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Jim_USATop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Sadly I have to return a very nice Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I have to return a very nice Jacket!! It looked and felt nice!! That being said, it was way too small in my hips to zipper. If I unzippered the sides part way, I could close and zipper the jacket over my hips but it was still snug. The arms, chest and waist area fit comfortably with some room to move. Here are my measurements I hope it helps....I ordered the XXL. 5'6" 220 lbs My Bust-46.5" My Upper Arm-15" My Waist-44" My Hip-50" the only are of the jacket that didn't fit me
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Function
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this jacket. I bought it in last minute desperation, none of my old winter gear fits. I am 55 and wear a size 14. I bought the XL. I needed every bit of it. It’s plenty comfy and super warm even for -15deg NY harsh winters. The hoodie is so cute and soft and warm around the face. The zips at the hip are perfect to open when sitting down and gives that extra room which doesn’t put a booty bump in your coat. It can be zipped up again to stop the wind on a walk. Great buy and I have a lot of coats, tho they don’t fit anymore lol, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Ocallaghan

customer_reviews.title: I love the olive color
customer_reviews.text: This picture makes the coat look cute. I love the olive color. I tried it on and if I could give it zero stars, I would have. It looked like I was wearing a sleeping bag. The fit was HORRIBLE. It was puffy in odd spots and zippers in weird locations and it just looked like a train wreck. There was no cute side I could find, like the picture shows. And it smelled funny. Thank GOD for returns. It was warm though.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A Kasma

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I got sucked into the story about how this coat became so popular in NYC and was excited to buy. Sorry I did. Terrible quality. Mine came with the sleeve lining sewed shut so I couldn't get my arm into it. Main zipper wouldn't zip. And way too small even though I ordered two sizes up. Much shorter than it appears in the photo, too. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana L. MaGill

customer_reviews.title: She likes it and says it keeps her warm
customer_reviews.text: It has lots of pockets for her to lose all her stuff in. She says it keeps her warm and she likes the design, done. It's the greatest coat of all time. Thanks Orolay
customer_reviews.author: Dantrax

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in mail today. Bought Green. Size Medium. I’m 5’9 165 pounds. Hourglass figure. DDD chest. Was still big enough. I really like it. Especially for the price. I own Canada Goose and Moncler winter coats and this is nice quality. And more roomy than their coats! Love the silver zippers and Orange lining. I read a lot of reviews saying it was too big, too small etc. It fits on the larger end on me, especially in the upper front and upper back. I wouldn’t order up sizes. I needed something to walk the dog at night when it gets chilly. Like the pockets! Hopefully I can machine wash. I wash everything before I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy I went for 4XL the second time around!
customer_reviews.text: I tried getting this jacket last year in an XL - it fit like a sausage encasement! All I wanted was that oversize look I kept seeing all over NYC! This year I gave it a try again and noticed that sizing went to 4XL! I am usually a 1X-2x (16-18 Size) , depending on cut. I could have done the 3XL. But the larger size gives me the oversize look I was looking for with plenty of room for jackets or sweaters - as if i would ever need it! This jacket is seriously warm. First night I wore it I got compliments galore. I would say that the 4XL is probably a size 20 American.
customer_reviews.author: cmd

customer_reviews.title: Keeping warm with a full hood
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this jacket. I enjoy all the unusual features, snaps and zippers all have a reason and i have worn it different ways. The full hood if you want or snap back if you dont. I bought the green and I am always getting people asking me where I got it. Its warm I've taken my sweater off before wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Jesse Ridings

customer_reviews.title: cute, warm, but falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I got this in a medium, it fits well. Maybe a little big but I like the extra room. It keeps me warm in a Midwest snowstorm. The biggest issue is that it was basically disintegrating before my eyes after only about two weeks of wear. One of the pockets is falling apart at the seams, another one has a giant whole in it, and there are multiple threads loose. The coat looks really nice and does the job, but the quality is horrible, which is extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mooni

customer_reviews.title: Good Jacket for $40, for $80 would have expected higher Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7'' 135lbs and a Small fits perfectly Pros: -Lots of storage space -very warm -soft fuzzy hood Cons: Baggy doesn't properly explain this. The front panels have extra down which makes me feel a bit like the Michelin Man Quality of zippers and fasteners on zippers seem cheap Hood has no drawstrings in the hood to tighten around the face so on a windy day the hood just flies off your head and you need a hand to keep it on your head
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.  Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seam was completely torn before I even removed it from its packing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Cozy!!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket kept me so warm from 30 degree weather in Denver! I wore a light long sleeve undershirt and did not need to layer. I am 5'3, and 120 lbs and the XS fits me perfectly. I probably would not be able to wear it with a lot of layers underneath but no need to since it keeps you very warm. I love that it runs a bit long keeping my bottom warm. I got a lot of compliments on the jacket Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed! I bought this exact jacket a few years ago before it was dubbed "the Amazon coat" by fashion bloggers. I ordered a new one as mine has gotten dirty over the years from putting it through the ringer. The material is now shiny and cheap, it has FAR LESS down and the stitching is crooked. I've requested a return 4 times and the seller just ignores it, so now I can't even return it. DO NOT BUY THIS COAT!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Cemelli

customer_reviews.title: I hate this coat
customer_reviews.text: I hate this coat. It looks like a tent on me, it's made of material that is noisy, and wearing an over-the-shoulder purse is out of the question because it will just continue to slide off this coat. It seems cheaply made considering how much I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy with the quality and the zipper. I returned and ordered again thinking thay I might have got a defective piece but again I had same issue with the zipper. I contacted the seller and I got response that they are aware of this problem and they will work on it. Won't be ordering the 3rd time. Too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: bad quality and not all that warm
customer_reviews.text: I took this jacket on my honeymoon. totally wish I hadn't! it didnt even last the two weeks of my trip. its far too hevy with out providing much warmth. the zippers snag at every turn even with WD40. it started falling apart almost immidiatly! it was totally a waste of money and i am very disapointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but quality issues.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat for my daughter to wear this winter while she is expecting. She has worn for about one month and likes that the coat is warm. However, the inside of pockets ripped almost immediately and one side zipper is completely broke and the other side zipper is stuck. I would return, but we live north in the Midwest and it’s the middle of winter. Therefore, I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CindyA

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money, I can tell I'll be wearing this jacket for years to come. Huge pockets, huge hood, long enough to cover your butt if you're wearing leggings. Also, while the body part of the jacket is puffy, the sleeves are much more fitted so you don't look huge while wearing it. The hip area is a little snug but there's a zipper to adjust it and give you more wiggle room. Really warm while feeling very light weight at the same time. Seriously, my new favorite jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but still very warm, looks very elegant and pretty, the pockets are very useful. I used it fo extreme cold in the north pole around -30 c. Can be used also for not extreme cold, around 5 c and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: A winter jacket with warmth and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this coat while reading the news! There was an article on Oprah's favorite things and went over to Amazon to check it out. I loved the look and the longer length. I ordered a medium, for reference I am 5'3", 138 lbs and wear 36C. The medium is a great fit and I can wear with a sweater. The hood keeps my neck warm. Only thing I would change is the pockets. They sit a little high, making it awkward feeling to walk with my hands in them. The true test will be in January when we are in Chicago. I will update more on the warmth at that time!
customer_reviews.author: ln2456

customer_reviews.title: Beware thick bottom ladies
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, don't buy this if you have any type of a fuller bottom half. The top of this jacket fit perfectly but I couldn't get the bottom to zip over my butt or thighs. A shame because the jacket itself was heavy and warm and I wish I could have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally different jacket! The color, material, size, and style was completely off. It also wasn't even the same brand. I don't know why I didn't just receive this jacket and got some knock off version instead. I'm completely annoyed by this since it is supposed to snow in the next few days and now I will not have a jacket. Do NOT buy if you want to receive the jacket in the picture!!!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Lacks pockets
customer_reviews.text: I like the basic design however the XL would be comparable to a regular 16 vs a woman’s 16. The other cons, they didn’t use a 2-way zipper to be able to open from the bottom. There are also only 4 small pockets. The lower ones are uncomfortable to use when you just want to warm your hands because they are too small, in front and not on the side & the zipper always scratches the back of your hand when using. Plus there isn’t an interior pocket which I think is good for protecting valuables such as my phone, ID’s, cash & credit cards etc. I should’ve paid more attention to when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: MOBinDG

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it... still too warm to try it out in terms of how it will keep me warm in 35 degrees and less. I'm 5'5" and about 128 to 130 on any given day. I got the medium as I was afraid to get the small. It's oversized to be sure, but not so much as I look like I'm wearing my husbands jacket. I could easily have purchased the small, but the sleeves perhaps might have been too short if I did so all is good... it's cute, more of a casual look. Purchased to go to work over my scrubs so that's that! Will update when it gets cold about how warm it is.
customer_reviews.author: TravelerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Next Size Up and The Jacket does not meet to zip up. #failure #returned #dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before buying and ordered accordingly. I usually wear a size large (L), so I purchased a size extra large (XL) and it does not even wrap around my hips. The jacket does not even reach far enough to be zipped up. I looked the jacket over and it is not as heavy as the comments claimed and it looks cheap. I will be returning this jacket and will not be ordering a bigger size. This jack will not be warm enough for weather in climates like New York. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LiveLuvLaugh

customer_reviews.title: faulty zipper
customer_reviews.text: So the zipper broke IMMEDIATELY! It must not have been stitched well. I live in NYC and got stopped several times in the street with compliments and people wanting to know where I purchased it. I also ran into a few people wearing it...same color and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Very cool coat
customer_reviews.text: This coat is really stylish - I can see why it is so popular. But I had to return it because it is heavy. I live in New York City and during the winter, every time I enter a building, I have to immediately throw off my coat because everywhere I go is overheated (steam heat). And then I would have to carry it. So lighter is better. The coat would be perfect for someone who walks her kids to school or takes them to the park or anyone who has a car and can throw the coat in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy888

customer_reviews.title: My wonderful Orolay
customer_reviews.text: I first noticed the Orolay jacket was listed under Oprah’s favorite things, having nothing but positive results purchasing from Oprah’s annual list I decided to buy the jacket, I first read a lot of negative reviews about the size and fit. So glad I disregarded all the negatives and bought the jacket. I love everything about my purchase. It’s not a jacket but a full length coat on me.5
customer_reviews.author: Lee Gher

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, buyer be warned. Ripped apart at the seams within a month of normal usage, see attached pics. My years older jackets are still intact, not this bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Rich-K

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous Proportions & Cheap Zipper
customer_reviews.text: The fit inside the arms is so narrow that only a stick-figure of a person could fit into this jacket. The white, faux shearing inside the hood is also a terrible idea as it will soon become filthy. The zipper is cheap & gets stuck so often that I was frustrated before I ever took the tags off. Sent this back for a refund before I THREW it out the window! I don't know how this could be billed as "the most popular jacket of the year". What year was that I wonder? What a load of baloney!
customer_reviews.author: urwrstnitemare

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! ****Update - TORN seam
customer_reviews.text: I love it - the color, the fit, the warmth. Perfect winter coat and very well made. Good buy *****UPDATE: Wore it once and the seam ripped. But now I have worn it for about a month of Buffalo cold. No more ripped seams, zipper a little difficult but very warm jacket. Overall, I would say I like it but it's not a jacket to wear year after year due to the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Debadebado

customer_reviews.title: Short arms....updated
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this jacket. I'm 5'6 150lbs, ordered a medium and it was perfect except for the shoulders and arms. Too short and I couldn't lift my arms. It's got to be defective, I have average shoulders not broad. I decided to return it, because the black Friday deal I got an exchange would not be honored. Pretty disappointed. Update: Orolay is a great company, they took care of the problem immediately, the new jacket in medium is a perfect fit. I will purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter coat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect winter jacket. I ordered this jacket for a winter vacation in Norway. The jacket fit perfectly, it was super warm (the temperatures ranged in the mid 20s,) and it was super light. I recommend this jacket! I'm 5'3, 125 lbs, orderd the small and was able to comfortably wear layers (thought I really didn't need too because the coat is warm enough.)
customer_reviews.author: Erin Moran

customer_reviews.title: Unless tall and thin keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews and being “the amazon warmest coat” but it was also the boxiest biggest too small coat I’ve ever tried on. Oh well. I’m too short and not skinny enough to not feel potato sacky in this. If you’re tall and skinny you should totally rock this coat... but if not probably not the best look. And especially because sooooooo many other girls running around town in this.
customer_reviews.author: smartin

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I already in returned this once because the medium was drowning me. I have had the small which is a perfect jacket fit; Not too tight, easy to layer with. less than a week of wear in this jacket and while the style is super cute, the quality does not match the price. Reached for something behind me while sitting in my car and the motion tore this whole under the arm. Unless you don't mind constantly repairing the seems of your clothing, I'd suggest paying $30.00 more for something that will last you a couple of winters. This won't.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Orolay coat
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this coat but as soon as I opened the box I already noticed a hole on the side of the coat . This shows poor quality and very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but poor quality...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket based on all the positive reviews for my daughter. When she opened it for Christmas and put it on she was thrilled beyond words. Schedule wore it that one day only to discover that the stitching around the pocket unraveled! I was upset and so was she. Yes it is made in China but the quality is poor. I will send it back. Unfortunate as it is a beautiful jacket. Maybe the quality inspector was sleeping on the job.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx Racer

customer_reviews.title: Arms were very tight
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful jacket. However, the arms were so tight that I have to return it. I am 5'6, 150...do not have heavy arms. I ordered a large so that it would be large enough to wear over a sweater or thick sweatshirt this winter. There would have been no way to do that. I do not know if this was simply a defect or how the jacket was made. I ordered an XL so I will see how this fit is. I will update this when I receive the new jacket
customer_reviews.author: M. Cass

customer_reviews.title: you will look HUGE in this
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is super thick, it's like putting a huge comforter on so if you're tall and skinny, it'll look pretty good on you, and you will be warm. But if you're short and on the heavier side....forget it! It's not a good look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend. I’ve only worn this coat three times and it is already terribly ripped. The fit is even a little big if I’m being honest, so it wasn’t stressed at the seams for any reason. I’m so disappointed in this poor manufacturing. It is now been more than 30 days so I’m left without options for return. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Size up.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing for this item is incredibly small. I bought a larger size because of other reviewer's comments and, I also knew that I would be wearing bulky sweaters underneath it, so I purchased a 5x I usually wear a size 2x in tops, I tried the coat on with a light-weight sweatshirt, the arms were extremely tight. Plus the jacket didn't even come close to zipping at my chest area. The zippers and the seaming did seem to be OK, I did read that other reviews had issues with this area.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Love it, looks as expected
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Thought about getting it for a long time and then pulled the trigger when it was on O list. I first ordered in red but the package was lost (amazon refunded$) and that was for the best bc I changed my mind. I ordered the green and I’m so happy with it. It looks just as expected. Haven’t worn it outside yet, will update when I do. I ordered a Med and it fits like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! I usually wear a large or xlarge, based on reviews I got an xxl because I wanted to be able to wear sweaters or hoodies under it. I could have easily gotten the xl It was really hard to try to figure out which size to get but I’m happy with the size I got. The jacket is very forgiving so as long as you stay with your normal size or one size up for roominess you should be fine. Made very well and sturdy zippers. Happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Gina M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this coat! It's fashionable, well-made, plenty warm, and well-designed. The six large pockets are really handy and the little ribbons hanging from them make them easy to access when wearing gloves. If you're looking for something to make you look trim and streamlined, though, this isn't it. That easy boxiness is exactly why I ordered it, however. I have a streamlined thigh-length coat from Eddie Bauer and while it's very warm, it's difficult to zip and won't zip shut if I wear a fleece or heavy sweater under it. I ordered a size up than what I usually would and it's perfect. I'm not surprised to see it on Oprah's list of Favorite Things this year!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This coat was so disappointing. After a few of my co-workers purchased it, I bought it for myself. Within a few days of wearing it, the coat had ripped. I'm so disappointed by the lack of quality with this coat.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Golub

customer_reviews.title: I’m not Ralphie
customer_reviews.text: I look and felt like Ralphie from A Christmas Story. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ec-lec-tic

customer_reviews.title: Not cute in a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this: an affordable and cute jacket with lots of pockets! I usually wear a size 12 and got a 2XL bawd on reviews that it ran small. I likely should have gotten an XL. But even so, this did NOT look cute on. At a larger size, this jacket just looks like an unflattering tent. It made me look so much bigger than I am
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TEXAN survived snow bc of this coat!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS COAT! I am from Texas and went to NYC and Buffalo, NY during December because I wanted to see the snow but I was scared that I was going to die from the cold. This coat was so warm! I was wearing a light Nike hoodie under. But still it made the trip so fun where I could enjoy the snow! The hood was so big it made it easy to walk in the snow bc it protected my face. I believe how warm it was in this coat. And all the pockets made it easy for me to travel with just a carry on. The pockets are huge! Which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it fits
customer_reviews.text: I ordered S returned for a medium. I normally wear size 6. The arms were a little tight on the small. I received the medium only to find that the zipper pull seemed to be bent. I returned it and received my new coat in about 24 hours. I haven’t had an opportunity to wear it yet. The weather warmed up considerably. Guess I won’t get to put it through the test til next year. It’s really a good looking coat.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the large in black. The jacket is poufy with a lots of padding. Intended for walks outdoor, commuters standing at the train or bus station. I am traveling to London so this will be perfect but for my normal lifestyle of driving around it is too much. The hoodie is large and extremely warm. There are ways to make the jacket expand on the sides and in the front. There are hidden pockets for your hands along the sides as well as in the front. The cost is worth the money it is gorgeous, comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe's mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this coat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat! I've gotten so many compliments in the short time I've had it. Based on other reviews I thought it would run big. I ordered an XL and it's not big... it fits like an XL would fit me. I ordered it in the green because I almost always where black and I wanted something different. I'm so glad I did...the green is so pretty! The coat is very warm as well! Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: ItalianGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I am someone who was born cold. I was truly surprised at the weight of this jacket and after trying it on, I think it will be good for this coming winter in New York. I am usually a size Medium, but I purchased a Large to give me extra room for layering. It is very roomy, and I probably should have ordered my regular size. For reference I am 5'9", around 128 and there was more than enough room. Love the style, and the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Saskia

customer_reviews.title: Fit your body AND has side zippers to go around larger hip!
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger hip and normally have to get a size up in order for the jacket to fit around my hip and be able to zip up. When I do that, I would have a bad fit on the top... this jacket, however, has zippers along both sides of the body to widen it up and allow the bottom to cover my hip and zip up!!!! OMG this is the best thing ever! Fit the top and fit around my hip. The jacket itself is well made and very warm. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M for Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Hi - I love, love this jacket. It is very warm as I live in Minnesota. No need for heavy things underneath. The construction is also very good. However, I did have a little problem with the zippers, they kept getting stuck. Everything seems to be ok now. Just so you know I get compliments every time I put this jacket on and go out in public. If you are looking for a great winter jacket this is it. The sizing was right on for me. I got a small. I am 5'6 and weight 134 athletic built. Perfect! Have no need to unzip side zippers. Thank you Marsha
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for a trip to Chicago this weekend where the windchill got down to -11 and highs in the teens. It arrived on time and fits perfectly. The jacket kept me warm and toasty all weekend while also looking cute and feeling comfortable. My only complaint would be the snaps on either side of the front zipper, which I feel are unnecessary and annoying because the frequently come undone. Overall, I'm super happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this coat. I am so happy with the purchase. I tend to always be cold and hate going outside when its cold. It really keeps me warm and comfy, the sleeves have the material at the end to stop cold air from entering, and the hood is super soft. I initially ordered a small (which is my normal jacket/coat size) but it was too snug, so I sent it back for a medium. All the pockets are awesome. When I go shopping, I have a spot for my money and credit cards, another pocket for my cell phone, and another pocket for keys....and more pockets. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: WAAAAY too big. Too much extra material n bulky. Expected way better for the price. It felt like one big sleeping bag with pockets.
customer_reviews.author: LM J.

customer_reviews.title: Hmm why is this Amazon’s # 1 jacket?
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is a few days old, cons: Zipper keeps getting stuck - most likely will return because this is very annoying. I am almost positive the seam at the shoulder and arm sleeve already has a rip The inside lining is cheap
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter coat!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! This coat is totally worth the hype - I have seen it on every blogger and had it on my wish list! Just got it last week when it was on sale for 107 - it’s so cozy, lots of pockets, so roomy with extra space for layering! The bottom side zips are cute and love how the hood sits up close to your neck. I ordered my normal size (xs - I’m 5’2 115 lbs) and it’s really loose but I love it that way! Lots of compliments!!
customer_reviews.author: Elpida Athanasiadis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!! Don’t believe the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly design zipper that always catches the fabric, making it impossible to zip and unzip. The zipper got so stuck on the loose fabric that hangs around by the zipper that the zipper broke off when I tried to get it unstuck. This jacket lasted me like 2 weeks. So disappointed and upset. Now I have to buy another winter jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase - cute and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat. I was nervous to buy because it feels like every woman in NYC has it, but I’m so glad I bought! The down fill makes it super warm, and I love the fit — big and comfy but structured. The side zippers are nice to change the style up a bit, and the hood is great. I got in navy and love the color (although I’ve seen some gals with it in red and that color looks amazing in person!) I’ve worn it a few times in some light rain and it holds up great. All the pockets are also fantastic!! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lavender brown

customer_reviews.title: Too many pockets!
customer_reviews.text: First: I chose this because I liked that it had so many pockets! But, I can't find them because they are in so many different places. Second: It finally dawned on me to cut off the ribbons that hang from the zippers because they always get caught in the zipper. Third: really warm. Fourth: NO Way to tighten the opening of the hood and wind make it fall back. Fifth: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got duped by the internet sensation
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit, when I first saw this jacket online, I thought it was hideous. Fast forward a few hours into reading reviews and seeing pictures, I thought it was quirky and fun, just what I was looking for. Ordered, arrived, and nope. Hideous. Giant (I almost kept it so I could babywear my infant in it) and hilarious in a not so good way. I ordered a small (typically I am a small/medium) and it was just laughably big. Not in a funny way though. Just in a sad way. Don't let the internet dupe you, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Warmest Coat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised with this coat. When I ordered it I really didn't have high expectations despite the high ratings and comments. I wanted a super warm coat so I decided to order it. I haven't been able to find a coat that keeps me warm while I'm walking my dog. Now I have a few The North Face jackets and a wool Pendleton coat but none keep me toasty warm like this coat. The fit is loose, I ordered a medium in navy but could have gone with a small and it hits above my knees but I'm only 4'11''. I've even worn it in the rain and remained dry and warm. I definitely recommend this coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money. Cheap product. Paid too Much for crap!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE PRODUCT!!!! Not as warm as they said. Two weeks into wearing my jacket, it ripped from the side armpit all the way down to hip and caused me a very embarrassing situation. Very unhappy. Useless and very cheap looking once I received it. The quality is poor and not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Chatz

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it more every time she wears it...
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about buying this for her as it did not look like something she would wear but I wanted her to have a good all weather jacket. However I have been extremely surprised that she has fallen in love with it. I worried about the length but she loves it as she says it is just long enough to keep her entire back warm and does not 'ride up'. Of course it extremely warm. It has become her default jacket since Christmas and I continue to receive compliments from her for picking something she probably would not have but, per my wife, is exactly what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Buy this coat-it’s AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat! The fit is perfect! (I’m 5’3 and weigh 100lbs) After reading other reviews I ordered the XS and I’m glad I did. It fits perfectly even with a sweatshirt on. Plenty of room to move with zippers that allow the coat to be expanded a couple inches. It’s super warm and cozy which is great considering winter has arrived very early in Michigan this year. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paula K. Brand

customer_reviews.title: Super warm!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. I decided not to size up for the extra room, so it fits pretty good. I am 5'5 140 lbs, and a 34C, it is a snug fit, but not too tight. Let me tell you, you will not need extra layers under this coat! It is SUPER warm, almost too warm, lol. I get compliments on it all the time. I live in Washington State, so it's not super cold here, so I would think if you are looking for something to keep you warm, this jacket is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Rolyart1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of oversized
customer_reviews.text: This coat is the answer to all my winter gripes. Its oversized, but still fashionable. Its incredibly warm. It has pockets on pockets -- so many pockets! I got 4 compliments on it the first week I wore it. I usually wear an XL so I bought an XL and it is plenty roomy. Yes, the bottom around the hips is a bit tight, but that's adjustable, and once I get the thing zipped I think it looks good tight on the bottom (not in the least bit uncomfortable, just slightly constraining). Quality has been great so far, no issues there. I would certainly recommend this coat to anyone facing a ~40N winter.
customer_reviews.author: bettyornot

customer_reviews.title: TRULY A CHEAP AND HORRIBLE JACKET
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this horrible jacket. The hood is so gigantic it lays heavily on the back of my head and the back of my neck and gives me a headache. The zippers are junk metal and they stick. When I received the jacket, the box was badly damaged and there was a DVD in the box I didn't order. I think this is amazon.com' scam way of getting customers to pay for merchandise they didn't order. I want to return the jacket but I cannot afford to pay the return shipping. Amazon.com is a crappy company!!!!!!!!!!!! I will not be ordering from it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have a Tom boy figure or, fit  Asian sizing this is for you
customer_reviews.text: Asian or tomboy figure will fit great! I tried two different sizes . Size "large" sleeves were tighter than other coats could not wear anything with it and had to open side zippers to zip front. " Xlarge" sleeves were better but still had to open side zippers halfway to wear it and the hood on the xl was piled up around the sides of my head and I felt stuck. It is a great coat very warm and I love the style. Unfortunately I'll never own one.
customer_reviews.author: sandy osterman

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket but i sat down and the side ripped due to the side zippers not giving slack on the sides. Very upsetting as i only wore a few times. The jacket is not tight either which makes me more confused as to why it happened to me twice, both times as i was getting into my car. Waste of money. I think the zippers are there for style but does not work for functionality.
customer_reviews.author: kimmyz

customer_reviews.title: Ugliest Jacket Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new winter jacket and heard about the Amazon coat so I thought I would buy one to see what the rage was about. First the zipper is very hard to pull up and down. The fit and shape is like you are wearing a potato sack, very unflattering. Going right back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Madmax Mema

customer_reviews.title: POORLY MADE!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this jacket twice and disappointed. The stitching on the jacket is coming loose and is coming apart in multiple places all over the jacket. It is sewn very poorly. The zipper on the side of the jacket is completely stuck and will not move up or down in either direction and the main zipper on the jacket is stuck now and cannot move up or down. I have to take the jacket off like a sweatshirt just to get it off! Can't believe that a jacket this expensive is this poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for freezing temperatures
customer_reviews.text: This is the warmest jacket I've ever worn. The hood is perfectly oversized to protect from precipitation, the wristbands keep out the cold, and the side zips allow for sitting more comfortably. I bought it in green and like the look of it, but be warned that the color is a bit different (a lighter green) than is shown in the pictures. The only problem I've had so far is the zipper is a little "sticky" - it doesn't always want to zip up as smoothly/quickly as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and trendy winter coat!
customer_reviews.text: Great winter coat, really warm and looks cute! The material inside the hood is super soft! I love that it has so many deep pockets for all my stuff. It fits TTS, the torso is really roomy so you could maybe size down if you don't have particularly long arms. The expandable side panels are great if you're pregnant. Overall highly recommend! I love the red for the holidays but just ordered the olive for a more neutral option. I have a detailed review on my highlights on Instagram, my account name is @cbstyled
customer_reviews.author: CBstyled

customer_reviews.title: Warm, fashionable, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket and a great price. The zippers and asymmetrical detailing make it look high-end. Very warm as well- I’ve worn it during several northeast winter days and been quite warm. FYI- It said it would take a month to arrive but actually arrived within days of ordering
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: WHY does it have an orange lining?
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, who decided a bright orange inside was a great call on a BLACK jacket? I would’ve kept this. The fit was decent and it seemed warm in the comfort of my bathroom. We’re taking a trip to NY in two weeks so I needed something quick. But are we serious with the orange interior? I even found THE EXACT SAME jacket under a different name (but with a fur hood attachment) and again - ORANGE. Guys. Stop it. Women don’t want orange stuff.
customer_reviews.author: RHizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5”2” about 135lbs. After reading reviews about how small this runs I ordered a medium.. Got it and it way too big. Had to return it. I reordered and got a small. It was not snug and fit great. I don’t think this coat runs small at all.
customer_reviews.author: Huntress

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed despite lovely color and softness.
customer_reviews.text: Returned within on hour of receceiving. Nice color, also very soft and lightweight. However, the poor construction immediately revealed itself-- there is a large hole/gap in one side pocket and two broken snaps in the front. One cannot snap, the other is missing part of the snap.
customer_reviews.author: Alethea B

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coat ever. It is seriously the warmest thing I’ve ever had. The only thing that I would change would be the orange lining inside just because I think it’s a weird choice with the grey coat, but it’s not a big deal. I can’t wait until it gets cold so I can actually wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Alyssa Deelstra

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought the M and I wear a size 6, weigh 135. It has enough room to layer sweaters under but doesn’t look too big. I love the navy with the bright orange lining. All the zippered pockets are great, lots of room to stash stuff safely. The style is cute and unique, but long enough to keep you warm. And the hood can reach out over your face to block a snowfall.
customer_reviews.author: BethG

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: I got this jacket in XL because I like a roomy fit. I found the jacket tight around the hips without the side zippers raised. The pockets are placed in an awkwardly high location compared to any other jacket I've ever worn. The sleeves bind uncomfortable wearing a medium weight knit shirt underneath. This becomes especially irksome when driving. I'm 5'-7.5" and 165 pounds with not much curvaceousness to my bod, though my shoulders are a bit wider than average. That said, the jacket is warm and has lots of pockets. I'll pass mine on to one of my nieces.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte dion

customer_reviews.title: A functional trendy coat!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is AMAZING! Love the style and the olive green color is right on trend! Love that the length can cover my backside! The abundance of zippers is a bonus for me- phone, chapstick, gloves, snacks can all fit! My only complaint is that it comes so wrinkly out of the package. So don’t plan on wearing it right out of the box. I steamed it first (Low setting to not damage fabric). Not sure how else to get the wrinkles out!
customer_reviews.author: Fitmom

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small but a great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the coat but I returned it because it was too small. I ordered another coat (Shanghai Bund version) in the same size and is almost exactly like this coat, but it fit perfectly. The navy color was a bit richer in the Orolay and the fleece in the hood was a little thicker and better quality. Both had orange lining which again the color in the Orolay jacket was a little richer. Both are great jackets but fit was most important.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great coat something different
customer_reviews.text: Oh what a great coat! I wanted something light but warm, fuzzy but not overbearing, trendy and not old fashioned, comfortable not bulky.This jacket fits all of these needs and it looks good too. I have yet to wear it out to see if it will be warm enough. I'm tired of big bulky jackets and also not interested in the lightweight goretex jackets that everyone wears nowadays. I was looking for something stylish and different. Since my hips are pear shaped the side zips are opened . My kids say i look young in this coat! What could be better than that? At this price? I'm ready for one in every color!
customer_reviews.author: amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy, but does not restrict movement
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite winter coat! This coat keeps me warm on cold, cold days (below freezing) and I️ am over 65 years old! I️ can still drive easily while wearing the coat, and I️ cannot with most heavy coats. I️ plan to wear this coat for several winters!
customer_reviews.author: rn4kids

customer_reviews.title: Orolay winter coat is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a plus size winter coat for myself. I never heard of this brand before however I wanted to give them a try because the coat was a must have. With its sheek look with no one else to compare its look to I knew I had to give it a try. Item was received 1 day after online purchase. Coat was neatly folded into a garment bag with label on front and clear middle to see the coat. I’m 5’9 and I’m full figured. I brought a 3x for extra room. Coat is beautiful, lots of pockets, heavy , stylish, warm.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia

customer_reviews.title: So glad I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews from ladies that are the my size (5’7, 140lbs) and the reviews were divided between small and medium. I chose the medium because I hate when my coats are restrictive. A small would have been fine, but the sleeves might have been snug. I also would have to unzip the sides further than I do now. The medium doesn’t look too big- it still looks very chic!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tharpe

customer_reviews.title: The Amazon Coat strikes again
customer_reviews.text: I saw this coat all over Instagram and now I understand why. I am shocked by the quality and the warmth for the price. I am always freezing and also have a child who plays ice hockey so I spend a lot of my time in rinks. This coat is comfortable, warm and fits great with or without layers underneath. The multiple pockets are also perfect for me because I'm not a big fan of carrying a purse. Worth the money for sure! I have a feeling this jacket will last me for multiple seasons to come.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Torn.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE! Seller has yet to return any messages very low customer service. The jacket feels like good quality except the pocket is torn open. I went to replace or return it but I’m honestly afraid a replacement will have a defect too. Could someone message me on a different option by I want to keep it and repair it myself rather than wait for another one that might also be broken. Not worth the price but other than that nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: feather leaking
customer_reviews.text: leaked feathers like a goose hit by a car. and way too small
customer_reviews.author: bronny ann

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the price. The next day after I received the coat, I found it at my local TJ Maxx for seventy dollars less. They even had the advertised "new" color. Felt cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer chick

customer_reviews.title: warmth without bulkiness.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Orolay down jacket, It fit me perfectly and I love the look not bulky at all, it has the sleek design not the puffy look I thought it would have so I was thrilled. I walk everyday and it keeps me really warm and I love the length especially getting in and out of the car. I am short so I pull the zipper up on the sides of the jacket to get into the car but when I am walking I lower the zipper even though I don't really need to but I think its great to have that option. I love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina
